options.responseText: Is it? Huh. Must be the elastic wearing out. Vault-issue gear is *so* unreliable after all that stretching…

followUpOptions.optionText: You know damn well that’s not it.
followUpOptions.responseText: If you’re so concerned, maybe you should get on your knees and zip me up. Or is that not allowed either, Officer Touchy?

followUpOptions.optionText: Jesus. Hugh looks like he aged a decade.
followUpOptions.responseText: Poor thing. He’s been so quiet. Must be the shame getting to him. Or the view. Who knows? Vault psychology is so fascinating. He’s been such a good listener too. I just talk and stretch, and he… well, he processes. Loudly. Repeatedly.
Gotta keep things ventilated. Wouldn’t want to overheat… unless someone *likes* a little sweat, that is.

followUpOptions.optionText: You’re seriously doing this with him in here?
followUpOptions.responseText: Doing *what*, exactly? I’m just lounging. It’s hot. My hand just happens to rest… here. And tug… there. Completely innocent.
He came in broken, sweetheart. I’m just polishing the cracks. Also, I merely... expand his spiritual limits. He ascended. Came back down. Then ascended again. Over and over.

followUpOptions.optionText: Why’s your hand *always* pulling your suit down a little more every time I look away?
followUpOptions.responseText: Is it? Maybe it’s muscle memory. Or maybe my hand’s just… rebellious. Naughty fingers. Tsk tsk.

followUpOptions.optionText: You know this is exactly why you ended up here, right?
followUpOptions.responseText: Really? I thought it was because I smiled too hard at the rec-room camera. Gotta be careful with those dimples, huh?

options.responseText: Oops, sorry. I was lost in thought. Or maybe I just got used to Hugh not lasting more than three seconds of eye contact anymore.

followUpOptions.optionText: This place is called the Shame Chamber, not the Strip Club.
followUpOptions.responseText: Well someone better tell Hugh. He keeps making it rain guilt and broken dignity over there.

options.responseText: Oh no. Not another report. Please. Report and maybe they’ll throw you in here too. Then we can all relax together.
